trans-unit.source: Provides read-only access to a set of prefix and namespace mappings.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組前置詞和命名空間對應的唯讀存取。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope" /> value that specifies the type of namespace nodes to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope" /> 值，指定要傳回之命名空間節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of defined prefix-namespace mappings that are currently in scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義之前置詞/命名空間對應的集合，目前位於範圍中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the current in-scope namespaces.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含目前範圍內的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The collection is keyed by prefix and can be used to enumerate the namespaces currently in scope.
trans-unit.target: 集合會根據前置詞索引，而且可用來列舉目前在範圍中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The collection is a disconnected copy of the current namespace list.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是中斷連接目前的命名空間清單的複本。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope> values and how it affects the whether or not the default and built-in namespaces are returned by the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.GetNamespacesInScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope>值以及分割如何影響是否在所傳回的預設和內建的命名空間<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.GetNamespacesInScope%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: XmlNamespaceScope value
trans-unit.target: XmlNamespaceScope value

trans-unit.source: xmlns:xml
trans-unit.target: xmlns:xml

trans-unit.source: xmlns:xmlns
trans-unit.target: xmlns:xmlns

trans-unit.source: xmlns=""
trans-unit.target: xmlns=""

trans-unit.source: yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: no
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you wish to find.
trans-unit.target: 您要尋找其命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI mapped to the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 取得命名空間 URI，對應至指定的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI that is mapped to the prefix; <see langword="null" /> if the prefix is not mapped to a namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 對應至前置詞的命名空間 URI，如果前置詞未對應至命名空間 URI，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Namespace URI-to-prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 的前置詞對應可以變更 XML 文件中的節點之間。

trans-unit.source: You cannot depend on the result of a lookup being consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 您不能依賴取得一致的結果從一個節點至下一個查詢的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the default and built-in namespaces are handled by the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的預設和內建的命名空間會由<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Prefix
trans-unit.target: 前置詞

trans-unit.source: Return Value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: xml
trans-unit.target: xml

trans-unit.source: xmlns
trans-unit.target: xmlns

trans-unit.source: `String.Empty` (A default namespace has been assigned).
trans-unit.target: `String.Empty` （預設命名空間已被指派）。

trans-unit.source: The currently assigned default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 目前指派的預設命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: `String.Empty` (The default namespace has not been explicitly assigned).
trans-unit.target: `String.Empty` （預設命名空間尚未明確指派）。

trans-unit.source: `String.Empty` (The blank prefix is associated with elements that are not in any namespace).
trans-unit.target: `String.Empty` （空白前置詞是與不在任何命名空間中的項目相關聯）。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI whose prefix you wish to find.
trans-unit.target: 您要尋找其前置詞的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix that is mapped to the specified namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得前置詞，對應至指定的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: The prefix that is mapped to the namespace URI; <see langword="null" /> if the namespace URI is not mapped to a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 對應至命名空間 URI 的前置詞，如果命名空間 URI 未對應至前置詞，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a namespace URI to be mapped to multiple prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 您可針對命名空間 URI 對應至多個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Because the prefixes are not mapped in a predictable manner, you should not depend on getting back a particular prefix when a namespace URI is mapped to more than one prefix.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞未對應可預測的方式，因為您不應依賴取回特定前置詞時命名空間 URI 對應至一個以上的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Namespace URI to prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞對應的命名空間 URI 可以變更 XML 文件中的節點之間。

trans-unit.source: You cannot depend on the result of a lookup being consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 您不能依賴取得一致的結果從一個節點至下一個查詢的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the default and built-in namespaces are handled by the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupPrefix%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的預設和內建的命名空間會由<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupPrefix%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Namespace
trans-unit.target: 命名空間

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: xml
trans-unit.target: xml

trans-unit.source: xmlns
trans-unit.target: xmlns

trans-unit.source: An empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: 空白的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A default namespace that has not been defined.
trans-unit.target: 未定義預設命名空間。
